title: Empress of the Sands Cassiopeia
body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/i9smN1J.jpg[/img]

Hi!, sorry for the crappy photo, my scanner is broken right now.

I know sands skins are a bit overused...but I think cass needs one, I mean she is a big part of the shurima events that unfolded, she is regal, and I think she is in the need of a sultry kinda skin.

Her Q, could be a gold blast 
Her W, a turquoise area of effect
Her E, a blue or gold fang.
And her ult could turn people into a golden sand statue....think azir soldier maybe.

For her recall, she creates a person of golden sand that fans her while she sits in a throne.

edit:
Thank for the comments!!! means a lot....what name do you think it would fit this skin? Pharaon Cass? Risen Cass?....also:

> Nunus Adventure (OCE) 
> And when she dies she turns to sand instead of stone? :)

love this idea.

replies.body: i love this idea
Cleopeia

Damn, this is 18+, though. Cover her up for the love of {{champion:268}} .

---

**Edit:** I love how people can't understand the joke and blindly downvote me for being SJW or some shit xD

Oh, you poor souls.
Listen. Due to snake physiology you wouldn't be able to see her girly parts, but Riot has that part of her covered on each and every skin anyway.

---

Now you can downvote me for spoiling the joke. Kappa, I guess.

>
> Damn, this is 18+, though. Cover her up for the love of {{champion:268}} .

Her original skin is like this though.
It's not. She has her thing covered in every skin and splash.

>
> It's not. She has her thing covered in every skin and splash.

Are you sure?

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Cassiopeia_4.jpg

> http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Cassiopeia_4.jpg

don't listen to that troll.  these people always come out to trigger riot on properly exposed female champs
Like they did to a hindu goddess who was always depict as topless. Kali in Smite, right?

you mean what kali actually looked like as a god based on sculptures by her people?
My Lord it's almost like she's a goddess and they're supposed to be sexually perfect beings or something!
FUCKING CRAZYEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

The best and the most ironic part is that it were hindu people who made HiRez totally redo Kali.

How come atheists always know the religion better than its own believers?

no it wasn't it was the overall SJW's and children.
She looks like the god idiot.
They just didn't like it being publicized.(the hindu people that somehow became A HUGE VOICE OVERNIGHT????yeah ok lmfao)
Simple as that.
People can't handle the truth.
not my fault she looks like a slut in her original depiction.
Thats just how she looks.
You don't see me giving one shit about it now do you?
you just brought it up cutie so I simply discounted your stupidity with facts and reasonable human logic

She's covered in the blood and skulls and limbs of her enemies
Looks nothing like she should.

Uh... you literally just said a Hindu goddess looks like a slut. She's a goddess of destruction, a demon killer, and she drains the blood from her enemies... and yet you feel the need to say she looks like a slut. Because if she shows skin, she must be a slut. 
Because everybody knows the naked human form is inherently sexual. (hint: sarcasm)

And anywho, any feminist with a problem about a goddess being correctly portrayed in a video game is probably a little confused. At least in that case, there's an actual reason for character who are supposed to be involved in combat being nearly nude- I can see any feminist being happy about that.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FPo6eaGx,comment-id=000700000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T12:54:59.259+0000)
>
> Like they did to a hindu goddess who was always depict as topless. Kali in Smite, right?

just looked it up kali is surprisingly really hot in it. idk what you mean by mentioning it, since we're talking about your types trying to put more clothes on female champs

She went from an acceptable portrait of real life Kali goddess with a skill set matching her real life lore to a female assassin #4352.

Plus they completely clothed her and removed nearly all of her traits, minus blue skin and four arms.

Kali in Hinduism has a necklace of severed human heads covering her breasts and a skirt made out of severed human arms.

Spot those in her updated look.
If you can't see skirts or any other form of clothing on those skins I suggest you consult your nearest oculist.

SJW's are the funniest shit since people who talk about feminism on the internet.
it's so funny it hurts.
http://mrwgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/Joke-Goes-Over-Your-Head-Star-Trek-Gif.gif
And when she dies she turns to sand instead of stone? :)

nice idea! <3
PLEASEEEEE do this. Crappy chroma skins arent even good enough for this champion tbh......
very beautiful, you can call it 'cleopatra cassiopeia'
This looks beautiful! I'd buy it in a heartbeat.
I LOVE IT! but change the name and we are good i mean her sister Katarina has a sand skin so why not.

> [{quoted}](name=Maratsune,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FPo6eaGx,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-08-13T03:51:39.754+0000)

the mythic one bugs me bc no hair snakes...

I love your design op! The gold and turquoise are a perfect match for Cass!

Love the idea of her abilities changing for her color scheme aswell
Beautiful skin, would definitely endorse this; she needs a new skin anyways, I don't even remember the last time she got a skin myself.
It fits {{champion:127}}  more
Why not both? Risen Lissandra is really a COOL -puns- concept! XD (bad joke sorry)
LOVELOVELOVELOVELOVE THIS!
this would be a welcome sand skin, though desperada does exist (which fits for wastelands moreso) :p

A skin that could possibly replace my Mythic if well done? o_O

Well played
like... she leaves a trail of sand where her "tail" would be? i like it! neat particle challenge for rito hahaha
i ship {{champion:69}} X {{champion:268}} because screw the haters

I love it! I don't play Cass much but she was a big part of the Shurima event and has nothing to really show that. It's not like she's had a skin recently that opts her out of one either. Such a nice design :D I love her tail (thing)!
i like it . prop insta buy if it they realese it {{champion:69}} {{summoner:30}}
Ahhh yes a Cleopatra type skin would be so cool!

This drawing is pretty and all, but it seems a little bland. I think she needs a more fun skin, like this FrostFang Cass skin that is in the forums right now. I think it is a great idea, check it out!  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/MoVU8XLh-frostfang-cassiopeia-updated

hey! thanks for the comment! and yeah...I dont think is a bland concept, for cass...I mean she is from noxus (blood and dark stuff) and was affected by a shurima curse (thats why I thought about a sandish skin for her)....she is the sister of Katarina the Sinister Blade, she manipulated sivir and betrayed her....so...I dont see cass in a fun skin....but hey is a lovely concept and the name is cool....thanks for sharing!
eeww azir dont want that hoe.
{{champion:101}} Mine!
